title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Kiro meets SaaS: Generating multi-tenant agentic applications with a GenAI IDE
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Kiro 遇见 SaaS：使用 GenAI IDE 生成多租户智能体应用程序
abstract: GenAI-powered development tools are changing how teams build multi-tenant agentic SaaS software. It's time to see how these tools can be used to accelerate the creation of entire SaaS environments. This session will walk through the end-to-end creation of a SaaS environment, using the AWS stack of GenAI services (such as Kiro and Strands) to construct an agentic-enabled SaaS environment. We'll build out the services of the control plane, create a sample agent-enabled multi-tenant application, and apply SaaS foundational principles to the solution (using best practices from the SaaS Builder Toolkit and the AWS Well-Architected SaaS Lens). The goal to provide a first-hand look at how a GenAI-powered experience can automate and streamline the creation of entire agentic SaaS environments.
abstract_cn: GenAI驱动的开发工具正在改变团队构建多租户代理SaaS软件的方式。现在是时候了解这些工具如何加速整个SaaS环境的创建。本次会议将演示端到端创建SaaS环境的过程,使用AWS的GenAI服务栈(如Kiro和Strands)来构建支持代理的SaaS环境。我们将构建控制平面的服务,创建支持代理的多租户应用程序示例,并将SaaS基础原则应用于解决方案(使用SaaS Builder Toolkit和AWS Well-Architected SaaS Lens的最佳实践)。目标是提供GenAI驱动体验如何自动化和简化整个代理SaaS环境创建的第一手视角。
